alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 11:03AM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills, as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. Portions of north central Wyoming. * WHEN...This morning and again overnight, until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures will combine with gusty winds to bring bitter cold wind chills this morning. Breezy conditions will combine with subzero temperatures overnight, to bring a return of bitter cold wind chills.
info.instruction: Keep pets indoors as much as possible. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
